      • copyTo

        public N copyTo(Path target)
         throws FileSystemLtRtException
        Copies the information of this node to a new one.
        If isGroup also copies all sub nodes.
        The target can not be a sub path.
        Parameters:
        target - path
        Returns:
        node that receives the copied information
        Throws:
        FileSystemLtRtException - if some exception is raised while interacting with file system, it should be at cause

      • moveTo

        public N moveTo(Path target)
         throws FileSystemLtRtException
        Moves the information of this node to a new one.
        If isGroup also moves all sub nodes.
        The destiny can not be a sub path.
        This node is removed from the file system if destination node is not equals to this one.
        Parameters:
        target - path
        Returns:
        node that receives the information
        Throws:
        FileSystemLtRtException - if some exception is raised while interacting with file system, it should be at cause
